name: ESCAPE and RAID
description:
An exceptionally small game with an exceptionally big file.  It's based on the GameDev.tv Unreal Engine 5 C++ tutorial and uses all free assets (mostly because I'm poor). Aim of the game is just to Escape and depending on the treasure you take you'll get one of four endings. 

Credits: 

  • Medieval Dungeon by Infuse Studio
  • Particles and Wind Control System by Dragon Motion

Known Bugs/Issues

  • Flickering in the distance
  • Some light bleeding
  • When going outside, if you don't hold the item in front of you it wont recognize it.

These won't be fixed since this game is too small to warrant not just making a better new game. 

This is my first ever game so if there's any major problems with the project let me know.
